name: Demolition Express (TJ, vfelici, meyers89)
description:
Demolition Express Elevator Pitch: 

Demolition Express is a destruction-based shooter where you play as a demolition crew tasked with destroying abandoned buildings by launching crew members armed with rocket launchers into the air and raining down chaos in the wild west.

How to play: Gamemodes:
  • Normal: The first level of how the game is meant to be played
  • Unlimited: A sandbox mode to play around with all the crew members
Controls:
  • Mouse: Camera look and aim
  • Left Click: Shoot crew (on ground) or rocket (in air)
  • Right Click: Use ability (in air, hold down)
  • R: Reset level
  • Q and E: Cycle crew members (unlimited mode only)
  • Esc: Reset game to main menu
